A

acceptingMoves - Variable in class game.JumpingCubeBoard
True if we are accepting moves from the screen at this point.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class game.JumpingCubeFrame
Responds to a click on a menu item (see ActionListener).
addMenuItem(String, String, String) - Method in class game.JumpingCubeFrame
Add a menu button named ITEMNAME to the end of the menu named MENUNAME from the menu bar, giving COMMAND as a description of what to do when the button is pressed.
addRadioMenuItem(String, String, ButtonGroup, boolean, String) - Method in class game.JumpingCubeFrame
Add a radio button named ITEMNAME to the end of the menu named MENUNAME from the menu bar, placing it in GROUP (only one radio button in a group is selected at a time), initially selecting it iff SELECTED.
addSeparator(String) - Method in class game.JumpingCubeFrame
Add a separator to the end of the menu named MENUNAME on the menu bar, creating that menu if needed.
addSpot(Color, int, int) - Method in class game.Board
Add a spot from PLAYER at row R, column C.
allCommandStrings - Static variable in class game.Command
Mainly fore debugging purposes, this contains string examples of all known commands.
allCommandTypes - Static variable in class game.Command
This array contains instances of all the possible commands, which is used to create new instances of specific commands.
alternativeInput - Variable in class game.Player
 
assertWithinBounds(int, int) - Method in class game.Board
Checks whether the given position is within the boundaries of the current board.
auto() - Method in class game.Game
 
AutoCommand - Class in game
Represents the auto command.
AutoCommand() - Constructor for class game.AutoCommand
Blank constructor for 'sentinal' instance that creates other instances of this command
